pullrequest.title: Start porting release process to GitHub

content.raw:
I made some changes:

* Support in DSL \(and params in release.py\) for the GITHUB\_RELEASE variable \(needed for release.py → build.bash communication\)
* Auto detection for github/bitbucket release repositories

    * Remove the --github parameter to simplify the release.py process
    * release.py will take care of checking if the release repository exists in Bitbucket and fallback to check github
    
* Added sdformat9 to list of debbuilder in sdformat DSL

The first success build with github for -release repos:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat9-debbuilder&build=10)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat9-debbuilder/10/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat9-debbuilder/10/))

‌

‌

  • Support in DSL (and params in release.py) for the GITHUB_RELEASE variable (needed for release.py → build.bash communication)

  • Auto detection for github/bitbucket release repositories

    • Remove the --github parameter to simplify the release.py process
    • release.py will take care of checking if the release repository exists in Bitbucket and fallback to check github

  • Added sdformat9 to list of debbuilder in sdformat DSL

The first success build with github for -release repos:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat9-debbuilder/10/)
